page.title: 15Chilton Community College.
page.content: Last year our Junior School was extended and altered so that the local people could use it in the evenings, during the holidays and also, in certain rooms, during the day. The Community College as it is called has added to many people's lives. As well as the recreational facilities that have now been made available a bar has been built in what was once the teachers' staffroom. Sports now available include five-a side, pool, uni-hoc, table tennis, bowls, darts, squash, badminton, taekwando and women's keep fit. Clubs and organisations also use the premises. The elderly can use the community rooms to play bingo. Once a week the Luncheon Club is held when the 'meals on wheels' are delivered to the college and the old people can enjoy their dinners in company.
